contentList.content: You cast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_Fireball">Fireball</LSTag> centered on yourself.
Your spells deal an additionl [1] per spell level.
Your weapon attacks deal an additional [1].
Afflicted with <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CONFUSION">Confusion</LSTag>. You are hostile to everyone, wander around aimlessly, and occasionally skip turns in your stupor.
At the start of your turn regain [1].
You cast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Grease">Grease</LSTag> centered on yourself.
All other creatures in a [1] radius of you have <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on all <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>.
Cast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_FaerieFire">Faerie Fire</LSTag> centered on yourself.
You have summoned a hostile spectator!

You have summoned a <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="TAD_MIND_SANCTUARY_AURA">Mind Sanctuary Bubble</LSTag> centered on yourself and can use <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ActionPoint">Actions</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">Bonus Actions</LSTag> interchangeably.

You are compelled to always tell the truth. You have <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="Deception">Deception</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="SkillCheck">Skill Checks</LSTag>.
You are <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BANISHED">Banish</LSTag> to another plane of existence.
The next spell that hits does maximum damage.
You become charged with a massive amount of static electricity. When a creature hits you with a melee attack, you deal 1d6 lightning damage to them.
For one minute, any creature that hits you will be charmed for 2 turns.
For one minute, any creature that hits you with a melee attack is pushed back 10 foot.

You have advantage on all <LSTag Tooltip="Constitution">Constitution</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability Checks</LSTag>. This condition is removed after a <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag>.
For one minute, all allies (including yourself) in a 30 foot radius fall under the Blink condition.
All non-hostile creatures have the spell Friends cast on them. This spell lasts for 10 minutes.

A distracting headache is making it difficult to think clearly. Your <LSTag Tooltip="Intelligence">Intelligence</LSTag> is reduced by 2. This condition is removed after a <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag>.
You regain all of your expended Level 1 spell slots.
Your body starts to glow and emits a light that eliminates nearby darkness.

Lightning strikes! All creatures (except yourself) in a 15 foot radius take 2d10 lightning damage. Creatures that succeed a dexterity <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> take half damage.
Every creature in a 30 foot radius becomes invisible.
For one minute, you are resistant to all physical damage.

All creature (except yourself) in a 60 foot radius must succeed on a <LSTag Tooltip="Constitution">Constitution</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> or becomed Poisoned for 2 turns.

You glow brightly in a 30 foot radius. Any enemy that is within 10 foot will be blinded. Blinded creatures must roll a <LSTag Tooltip="Constitution">Constitution</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> to remove this condition.
You become a sheep for 5 turns.
You have summoned a hostile Owlbear.
You have summoned a minor illusion that lasts for one minute
All hostile enemies in a 60 foot radius gain the Death Ward condition. On a lethal hit, they survive with 1 hitpoint remaining.

All creatures (except yourself) take 1d10 necrotic damage, or take half as much damage with a successful <LSTag Tooltip="Constitution">Constitution</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag>. You regain half of all damage dealt.
You cast Mirror Image on yourself.
All creatures in a 30 foot radius gain the ability to fly.
You cast Invisibility on yourself. Invisibility ends early if you attack, cast another spell, interact with an object, take an action or bonus action, or are damaged.
You are able to use <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Teleportation_Revivify">Revivify</LSTag> until your next <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag>.

All creatures become <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="ENLARGE">Enlarged</LSTag>. They gain <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability Checks</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>, their weapon attacks deal 1d4 more damage.

All creatures in a [1] become <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="REDUCE">Reduced</LSTag>. They suffer <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability Checks</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>, their weapon attacks deal 1d4 less damage.
All creatures (including yourself) in a 30 foot radius are vulnerable to piercing damage.
Wild Magic: Curse of the Clown
You are cursed to become a clown. Your <LSTag Tooltip="Charisma">Charisma</LSTag> is increased by 1, up to a maximum 20, and you have immunity to Tasha's Hideous Laughter.
You gain another action for the duration of combat.
You regain all expended Sorcery Points.
You regain all expended Rage Charges.
You cast Haste on all creatures (except yourself) in a 30 foot radius.
You temporarily lock all doors and chests nearby in a 100 foot radius.
You unlock all nonmagical locks in a 100 foot radius.
You have summoned a menagerie of familiars.
For the next 3 turns, all of your attack rolls are critical.

You are able to read minds and gain access to the spell Detect Thoughts. Others are able to read your mind as well. You have <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on all <LSTag Tooltip="Charisma">Charisma</LSTag> based <LSTag Tooltip="SkillCheck">Skill Checks</LSTag>. This condition is removed after a <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag>.
At the start of your next turn, all creatures in a 30 foot radius will become vulnerable to a random damage type. This condition will last.
For one minute, all creatures in a 30 foot radius are vulnerable to Acid.
For one minute, all creatures in a 30 foot radius are vulnerable to Cold.
For one minute, all creatures in a 30 foot radius are vulnerable to Fire.
For one minute, all creatures in a 30 foot radius are vulnerable to Force.
For one minute, all creatures in a 30 foot radius are vulnerable to Lightning.
For one minute, all creatures in a 30 foot radius are vulnerable to Necrotic Damage.

When you cast a spell of 1st level or higher, you deal 1d6 fire damage in a 10 foot radius around the target. Targets that succeed a dexterity <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> take half damage. For a spell of first level or higher, add a additional 1d6.
The next time you are healed, you regain full health.
For every 500 gold you have in your inventory, you take 1d6 fire damage.
You have summoned Percy, the Pacifist Kobold. Percy will help you, but will not attack. Percy knows the spells Sanctuary, Heroism, Healing Word and Resistance.

If this creature attacks another creature, they explode in a 20 foot radius and take 8d4+36 Force Damage. Creatures that succeed a dexterity <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> take half damage.
All creatures in a 30 foot radius that fail a Wisdom <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> become fearful of you and drop their weapons.
You have summoned six hostile crabs.
You have summoned Bob the Friendly Zombie
You are cursed with Vampirism! You gain access to Bite, Claws, and Charm Person. Your <LSTag Tooltip="Charisma">Charisma</LSTag> increases by 1, up to a maximum of 20.
You transform into a cloud of mist for 3 turns.
A rainstorm starts above you; Anything underneath the storm becomes wet.
You become immune to fire. You are also on fire. You can not put out this fire.

You temporarily gain the powers of a Storm Sorcerer. You have access to the spells Thunderwave, Create or Destroy Water, Gust of Wind, Sleet Storm, and Call Lightning, and gain the passive Heart of the Storm. This condition is removed after 1 minute.
At the start of your next turn, one of your <LSTag Tooltip="Abilities">Abilities</LSTag> will temporarily be reduced by 5.
Your <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag> has been decreased by 5.
Your <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag> has been decreased by 5.
Your <LSTag Tooltip="Wisdom">Wisdom</LSTag> has been decreased by 5.
Your <LSTag Tooltip="Charisma">Charisma</LSTag> has been decreased by 5.
At the start of your next turn, one of your <LSTag Tooltip="Abilities">Abilities</LSTag> will temporarily be increased by 5, up to a maximum of 20.
Your <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag> has been increased by 5, up to a maximum of 20.
Your <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag> has been increased by 5, up to a maximum of 20.
Your <LSTag Tooltip="Constitution">Constitution</LSTag> has been increased by 5, up to a maximum of 20.
Your <LSTag Tooltip="Intelligence">Intelligence</LSTag> has been increased by 5, up to a maximum of 20.
Your <LSTag Tooltip="Wisdom">Wisdom</LSTag> has been increased by 5, up to a maximum of 20.
Your <LSTag Tooltip="Charisma">Charisma</LSTag> has been increased by 5, up to a maximum of 20.
All other creatures within [1] of you are <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DISARMED">Disarmed</LSTag>.
All enemies within [1] of you must succeed a <LSTag Tooltip="Wisdom">Wisdom</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> or become <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CHARMED">Charmed</LSTag>.
All allies within [1] of you are <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Help">Helped</LSTag>.
All creatures within [1] of you gain <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FREEDOM_OF_MOVEMENT">Freedom of Movement</LSTag>.
Your blood is highly flammable and will explode when it comes in contact with fire.
All enemies within [1] of you are afflicted with <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="IRRESISTIBLE_DANCE">Otto's Irresistible Dance</LSTag>.
You have summoned a friendly spectator.

You have temporarily increased your <LSTag Tooltip="Intelligence">Intelligence</LSTag> by 4. Following a <LSTag Tooltip="ShortRest">Short Rest</LSTag>, this benefit ends and your <LSTag Tooltip="Intelligence">Intelligence</LSTag> is instead reduced by 2. Either condition is removed following a <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag>.
You cast the spell Heroes Feast.
Wild Magic: Mass Wild Magic Surge
At the start of their next turn, all creatures (including yourself) trigger a random Wild Magic Surge.

All enemies within [1] of you must succeed a <LSTag Tooltip="Wisdom">Wisdom</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="POLYMORPH_SHEEP">Polymorphed</LSTag> into sheep.
